description:
This training is built only on practical exercises. You can easily test the strength and the result of these exercises, if you start practicing at least five minutes a day

This course doesn’t include any theory or scientific explanation.

This course solves the following speech problems:

I do not know what to say or how to start a conversation. I do not know what to say when meeting new people (on dates, parties). I am not a sociable person. I do not like to talk in public. There are some tricky questions at the interview and I do not know how to answer them. I'm an introvert, and I have some problems with communication. I am an extrovert and I have no problems with communication, but nobody listens to me
title: The Verb Improvisation. Speak, Tell, Talk. Easily and freely
